titleStmt.title: The Quakers challenge made to the Norfolk clergy, or, A relation of a conference between some clergy-men of the Church of England and some Quakers held (on the 8th of December 1698 in West-Dereham Church) in the county of Norfolk : together with those letters which passed between them in order thereunto : to which is added a certificate relateing to the challenge.
titleStmt.author: Beckham, Edward, 1637 or 8-1714.
Meriton, Henry, d. 1707.
Topcliffe, Lancaster, 1646 or 7-1720.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by H. Hills for Edward Poole,

notesStmt.note: Signed (p. 8): Edw. Beckham, Henry Meriton, Lancaster Topcliffe.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
